column4: please help me. i am facing this problem http://pastie.org/346776
i am unable to update my packages. please help me http://pastie.org/346776
what sequence of events led up to this message, say, roughly since the last working upgrade? :)
well.. around 10 days, back, in the middle of an update my PC just rebooted. and then i used somebody's advice here, to somehow resume update.. now again i am having this problem
can i not rebuild that file ?
i backed up the status file... but that backed up status file was not a good one. we made changes to the status file and re-ran apt-get update
and now, i am not able to install any application , or update ...
ouch, that doesn't sound fun.  also i'd need to know what changes you made.  any idea who helped you?
is there no way to rebuild this file ? googling made me find this perl script which does it http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=474587     But i am not trusting it
some, onetinman, or something like that.
sorry, juggling convos, let me scroll a bit ;)
do you have a log of your past convo?  also, have you considered reading this script you don't trust and trying to learn more.
reading through past things..... i dont really understand that.....
and i was always wondering, is there no way to rebuild this file ?
even if it takes 1 hr to rebuild this file.. i am prepared to do this
sure, i just don't know how, you need to take this opportunity to learn more about apt, what that file is.
